SELECT admission.admission_nm , attend.type_nm , examinee.major_nm , examinee.dept_nm , attend_map.group_nm , attend.attend_nm , attend.attend_date , attend.attend_time , hall.head_nm , hall.bldg_nm , hall.hall_nm , hall.is_etc , (SELECT hall.head_nm FROM hall WHERE hall.hall_cd = attend_map.attend_hall_cd) AS attend_head_nm , (SELECT hall.bldg_nm FROM hall WHERE hall.hall_cd = attend_map.attend_hall_cd) AS attend_bldg_nm , (SELECT hall.hall_nm FROM hall WHERE hall.hall_cd = attend_map.attend_hall_cd) AS attend_hall_nm FROM attend INNER JOIN admission ON admission.admission_cd = attend.admission_cd LEFT JOIN attend_hall ON attend.attend_cd = attend_hall.attend_cd LEFT JOIN hall ON hall.hall_cd = attend_hall.hall_cd LEFT JOIN attend_map ON attend_map.attend_cd = attend_hall.attend_cd AND attend_map.hall_cd = hall.hall_cd LEFT JOIN examinee ON examinee.examinee_cd = attend_map.examinee_cd
AND admission.admission_nm = #{param.admissionNm} AND attend.type_nm = #{param.typeNm} AND examinee.major_nm = #{param.majorNm} AND examinee.dept_nm = #{param.deptNm} AND hall.head_nm = #{param.headNm} AND hall.bldg_nm = #{param.bldgNm} AND hall.hall_nm = #{param.hallNm} AND attend.attend_nm = #{param.attendNm} AND attend.attend_date = #{param.attendDate} AND attend.attend_time = DATE_FORMAT(#{param.attendTime}, '%T') AND hall.is_etc = #{param.isEtc} AND attend.admission_cd IN (${param.userAdmissions})
GROUP BY admission.admission_nm , attend.type_nm , examinee.major_nm , examinee.dept_nm , attend_map.group_nm , attend.attend_nm , attend.attend_date , attend.attend_time , hall.hall_cd , hall.head_nm , hall.bldg_nm , hall.hall_nm , hall.is_etc
